content: sts before marker k2tog sm k1 ssk k to 2 sts before end of round k2tog 4 sts decreased round 2 k to end of round repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have 20 28 36 sts left -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- strawberry pattern written instructions row 1 p1 k tbl × 3 p1 7 sts row 2 p1 k tbl p1 increase to 5 p1 k tbl p1 11 sts row 3 - 5 p1 k tbl p1 k5 p1 k tbl p1 row 6 p1 k tbl p1 ssk k1 k2tog p1 k tbl p1 row 7 p1 k tbl p1 k3 p1 k tbl p1 9 sts row 8 p1 k tbl p1 sl1 k2tog psso p1 k tbl p1 7 sts row 9 repeat row 1 row 10 p1 increase to 5 p1 k tbl p1 increase to 5 p1 15 sts row 11 - 13 p1 k5 p1 k tbl p1 k5 p1 row 14 p1 ssk k1 k2tog p1 k tbl p1 ssk k1 k2tog p1 row 15 p1 k3 p1 k tbl p1 k3 p1 11 sts row 16 p1 sl1 k2tog psso p1 k tbl p1 sl1 k2tog psso p1 7 sts 4 strawberry cheesecake socks by debbie ford abbreviations k2tog knit 2 stitches together knit knit k tbl knit through the back loop purl purl ssk sl1 knitwise sl1 knitwise place both sts back on the left needle and k2tog through the back loop yo bring yarn forward and over the right hand needle creating a new stitch pm place marker bor beginning of round sm slip marker repeat sts between brackets the indicated number of times sl1 slip 1 st purlwise with yarn at back sl1 k2tog psso slip next stitch purlwise knit 2 together then pass slipped stitch over increase 1 to 5 k1 yo k1 yo k1 into the same stitch to make 5 stitches from 1 strawberry pattern chart i love seeing what you make tag your photos with @daisystitches and use the hashtags #strawberrycheesecakesocks and #debbieforddesigns this pattern has been tested and tech edited for pattern support you can email me at de88ieford@yahoo co uk 5 strawberry cheesecake socks by debbie ford
